hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Regime Breakout on Regulatory Clarity
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades in a 10% range for 15+ days during NEUTRAL regime, a definitive positive regulatory headline (MiCA implementation clarity, US ETF approval progress) triggers a 5%+ breakout that sustains for 3+ days, signaling transition to BULL regime.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended compression during neutral periods creates pent-up energy. Regulatory clarity reduces systemic risk premium, triggering institutional flows. ETH confirmation reduces false breakout risk.
entry_conditions: BTC breaks above 15-day high by >2% on above-average volume (+30% vs 20-day MA)
ETH confirms within 24 hours (breaks own 15-day high)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 15% gain from entry OR regime indicator confirms BULL (confidence >75%)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to attract follow-through volume (<+15% vs average) and price reverts within 48 hours despite positive catalyst.
